allow: Bash(printf '%s\\n' 'import sys' 'sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=""utf-8""\)' '' 'def update_file\(filepath, keys_file\):' '    with open\(keys_file, ""r"", encoding=""utf-8""\) as f:' '        new_keys = f.read\(\)' '    with open\(filepath, ""r"", encoding=""utf-8""\) as f:' '        content = f.read\(\)' '    content = content.rstrip\(\)' '    if content.endswith\(""}""\):' '        content = content[:-1].rstrip\(\)' '    new_content = content + ""\\n"" + new_keys' '    with open\(filepath, ""w"", encoding=""utf-8""\) as f:' '        f.write\(new_content\)' '    print\(""Updated: "" + filepath\)' '')
